MAIN_MESSAGE: We apologise that today's pre arranged work affecting your property in the KA5 postcode area of Mauchline is still ongoing. This is due to difficult ground conditions and we now expect power to be back on by 5pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.51pm on Thursday 11th February 2021
